snippet.title: burstly official trailer
snippet.description:
Imagine you are about to learn the proven ways to use your eye and finger coordination to put people into what I call a super reflexive state in a fun & effective manner..

Burstly is a fun, addictive android arcade game...

I don't know if this is a bad game or how you play this game..

You probably already know that ONLY TALENTED persons could PLAY this game...

HOW TO PLAY
------------------------
1) Touch anywhere on the screen (not on top of character) and 
     drag
2) Avoid all triangles
3) Collect points

TRUST ME... YOU NEED THIS... HURRY UP.. PLAY NOW.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nerampoke.burstly&hl=en
